title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Slaves of the Republic, Volume 1: The Mystery of Kiros
description: Jedi: Obi-Wan Kenobi, Anakin Skywalker, Master Yoda, Master Mace Windu, and others, will be joined by a few new faces as they fight to maintain the true spirit of the Republic. Spotlight editions are printed on high-quality paper and with reinforced library bindings specifically printed for the library market. Grades 6-12.
author: Henry Gilroy
